argument.description: An Oracle namespace that has already been created. If the namespace of 'USERENV' is used, attributes describing the current Oracle session can be returned.
A valid attribute that has been set using the DBMS_SESSION.set_context procedure.
Optional. It is the length of the return value in bytes. If this parameter is omitted or if an invalid entry is provided, the sys_context function will default to 256 bytes.

returnType: The SYS_CONTEXT function returns a string value.
description: The Oracle/PLSQL SYS_CONTEXT function can be used to retrieve information about the Oracle environment.
